name: Uta
text: On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 "Red Haired Pirates" card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 "Red Haired Pirates" card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

meta.notes: Character ability. [On Play] triggers when card is played to Character area (rule 10-2-6). Effect allows looking at top 5 cards of deck (rule 11-3 Viewing Secret Areas), revealing up to 1 card with type 'Red Haired Pirates' (rule 2-4 Type) per 4-8 (up to X cards), and adding to hand (rule 11-2-1 Revealing Cards). Remaining cards placed at bottom of deck in any order chosen by player.
